titleStmt.title: The saints gain by death, and their assurance thereof a sermon preached at the funerall of that worthy patriot Richard More, esquire, late one of the burgesses in this present Convention of Parliament for the town of Bishops-Castle in the countie of Salop / by Humphrey Hardwick ...
titleStmt.author: Hardwick, Humphrey, b. 1601 or 2.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I.L. for Philemon Stephens ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
